name: UserPreference
title: User Preferences API
description: Exposes REST endpoint for managing user preferences

operations.description: Creates an user preference with the given preferenceName for the application identified by appName. Updates the preference if already exist
Fetch an user preference with the given preferenceName for the application identified by appName.
Delete an user preference with the given preferenceName for the application identified by appName.

operations.summary: Fetch all preference names or complete preferences details
operations.description: Fetch all preferences details if summray param is false else fetch all preferences names as summary.

operations.summary: Delete selective or all preference for an app
operations.description: Delete selective or all preference for an app. For all provide * as preferenceName
